title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
created_time: September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMLast edit: September 12, 2022, 04:55:01 AM by sujonali1819
content: Hi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. They usually attached there contact info on the about section of there channel for there contact. Most of the twitch streamer has a youtube channel and you can see all there details on there youtube channel about section. I’m not familiar on twitch works but I’m sure they post there contact details somewhere on the channel profile.I preferred this streamer https://youtube.com/c/RiiSki because he is providing a natural content on blackjack. You can contact him on his discord account https://discord.com/invite/riiski

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. I think the best way is through reaching them on their YouTube accounts or any social media platform that they have. Generally, these streamers post their details on the page itself for possible affiliations and offers (such as this one).I would suggest checking on Twitch.tv as there are lots of streamers who majority streams at least every single thing. You would surely find some suitable persons that match your qualifications, sujo!Since you mentioned about streaming, I am excited to see as to what you have in mind- maybe some streamers who would advertise blackjack? Anyway, best of luck sujo!

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: I think you can reach them via their business email, I think every of them always include their email on the description.Personally I'm not kind a person who watch a streamers since there's nothing that make me interested to watch them, except a girl who have a sense of teasing or adult jokes. We can't deny most of gamblers are man and man are interested with woman.I prefer a streamer that have a kind of character rather than the one who really have a good skill or high roller.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: I've seen some streamers on Facebook Gaming, Twitch.tv or even on Youtube who streams their gambling activities. You can usually contact them through their page and you'll be responded by their managers or social media handlers or even themselves. Also, most of their contact information can be on their about information especially their email address.Unfortunately, I don't have a lost of recommendation but you can filter out these streamers by displaying streamers under "Slots" on twitch. Also, it is better to know on which platform you want these streamers as some of them only stream on specific platform such as facebook or twitch.

He is less popular.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. All Youtubers especially those who do streaming and unboxing have their social media account on the description below their videos in case there is a business offer for them to do an unboxing or to stream, check them out and if you can't find it there, check their about page, streamline the popular gambling streamers using a search bar and many will come out in the search results use a variety of keywords, you can also use Google because Google rank streamers in the research engine.

comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on September 11, 2022, 01:39:13 PMI think you can reach them via their business email, I think every of them always include their email on the description.Personally I'm not kind a person who watch a streamers since there's nothing that make me interested to watch them, except a girl who have a sense of teasing or adult jokes. We can't deny most of gamblers are man and man are interested with woman.I prefer a streamer that have a kind of character rather than the one who really have a good skill or high roller.Streamer usually don’t have business email but rather they preferred to be contact on there social media account such as twitter, telegram and discord for much faster response because they always online there compared on checking regularly there email. I’m following many streamers twitch and most of them attached there social media links as way on contacting them and so far I don’t see any streamer that I follow that attached business email to contact them. Maybe they will provide business email once you contact them on social media for receiving the contract for partnership.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I don't have a list but if you've got time or you'll hire someone to do it for you, the task is going to be like this.On Twitch, you'll look just search for those gamblers on that niche and the streamers will come out and usually, on their channels, they have the contact such as email which is the usual.The same goes for the YT gambling streamers if YT is allowing it.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: Quote from: cabron on September 11, 2022, 01:54:30 PMQuote from: Beparanf on September 11, 2022, 12:33:27 PMI preferred this streamer https://youtube.com/c/RiiSki because he is providing a natural content on blackjack. You can contact him on his discord account https://discord.com/invite/riiskiIf I am to look for streamer to hire, the minimum subscribers I would consider will probably more than 200k-300K and will still negotiate about the price down to minimum also.    RiiSki has less than 50K. He is less popular.  I don't think that you'll be able to hire someone with more than 200k subscriber and offer minimum amount for their service and collaboration. I don't even think a normal streamers who stream games will accept a minimum offer. We must also think that gambling streamers doesn't receive as much viewers as normal games. Upon checking to RiiSki, I've seen that most of her videos received more than 1-2 thousands viewers per video on her youtube channel. I think that it's sufficient enough to be qualified for a collaboration and it has potential to provide more clients and gamblers to the platform.

comments.author: Boristhecat
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. Perhaps you should at least in general outline the boundaries of your interest. Should these be streamers in English only or are other languages being considered as well? Should they be streamers with gambling content or just popular ones? What is the minimum number of viewers they should have? I watch streamers of different subjects and each of them has contacts in "channel information" for business inquiries. I think this is the easiest way to contact them.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on September 11, 2022, 02:04:43 PMMaybe they will provide business email once you contact them on social media for receiving the contract for partnership.Once you check their socials that's where you'll find their business emails, at least that's what i've seen most of the time from the streamers that i've been following on Twitter or Instagram.I've been watching some gambling streamers from time to time but I don't think I could provide a good list of gambling streamers to recommend since most of them have thousands of viewers on average like Trainwrecks, Yassuo, Roshtein, and Prodigyddk(if this helps).

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Just did a quick search in google and found this https://streamsentials.com/casino-streamers/ Based on that list, these streamers has many followers, the top one has 1.7M followers so it can be a great marketing tool if a casino hire or get a deal with him. How to contact them? I think most of them has their own social media account so you can contact them through private message in the social media. Or you can contact them directly from where they are streaming such as twitch or youtube.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: These streamers usually put up their business email on their profiles. They also don't want to miss out on possible partnerships with gambling platforms. Apart from that, you can try and donate to their stream and ask for their business email directly. That will surely get things done faster and you'll know that streamer acknowledges that there is something that you want from them. Check gambling streamers on twitch and try to watch their stream for a minute or two, or send a donation to get your messages displayed on their stream.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. You can contact them directly on their social media accounts or through emails provided on their Youtube and streaming accounts. Most streamers provide their contact details on their accounts so businesses who need advertisers and streamers could reach out to them easily.

If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. Sometimes they are providing their email address in their bio, social media accounts are fine as well but it will be more look formal via email. I try to contact some streamers before for a certain collaboration with my previous client because I work at digital marketing, they don't entertain social media messages that's why I email them and some of their mods will reply to you.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. Streaming is indeed a good form of marketing, but I am afraid that their fees might be off the roof, most especially those of them with a lot of followers, but I think it's nothing a big casino or company cannot afford.Streamers I've watched often leave a means or link through which they can be contacted in their bio , maybe try going to YouTube, try to watch some streams, find one you feel meets the standard you want, go through the streamers bio, you definitely would find a way to contact the streamer since most of don't stream for fun but as a means of earning money.

comments.author: Fortify
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on September 11, 2022, 12:29:03 PMHi guys! I need some good streamers who do live stream their gamble. So what is the best way of contacting them? If you know about it, or you have a good list of streamers please share. Or if you are a streamer you can contact me, and we can make a suitable deal for streaming. Thank you. Surely you can see the chat functionality that accompanies most streamers? They also usually have information boxes with methods of contact, or maybe you could go ahead and make a private donation to their paypal address with your question attached in the comments. You're better off going out and finding streamers who fit with what you need than asking for requests here, because this place is at best going to have a handful of possibly popular streamers, but there are people out there on places like Twitch and Youtube with potentially hundreds of thousands, even millions of regular viewers instead. You might also want to state that you'll pay in fiat as so may have no interest in Bitcoin or other crypto.
